verses.verse: Now those that sealed <WH2856> were <WH5166>: Nehemiah the governor <WH8660>, the son <WH1121> of Hacaliah <WH2446>, and Zedekiah <WH6667>,
Maaziah <WH4590>, Bilgai <WH1084>, Shemaiah <WH8098>; these were the priests <WH3548>.
And the Levites <WH3881>: namely <WH3442>, Jeshua the son <WH1121> of Azaniah <WH245>, Binnui <WH1131> of the sons <WH1121> of Henadad <WH2582>, Kadmiel <WH6934>;
and their brethren <WH251>, Shebaniah <WH7645>, Hodiah <WH1941>, Kelita <WH7042>, Pelaiah <WH6411>, Hanan <WH2605>,
The chiefs <WH7218> of the people <WH5971>: Parosh <WH6551>, Pahath-moab <WH6355>, Elam <WH5867>, Zattu <WH2240>, Bani <WH1137>,

And the rest <WH7605> of the people <WH5971>, the priests <WH3548>, the Levites <WH3881>, the porters <WH7778>, the singers <WH7891>, the Nethinim <WH5411>, and all they that had separated <WH914> themselves from the peoples <WH5971> of the lands <WH776> unto the law <WH8451> of God <WH430>, their wives <WH802>, their sons <WH1121>, and their daughters <WH1323>, every one that had knowledge <WH3045>, and understanding <WH995>;

They clave <WH2388> to their brethren <WH251>, their nobles <WH117>, and entered <WH935> into a curse <WH423>, and into an oath <WH7621>, to walk <WH3212> in God <WH430>'s law <WH8451>, which was given <WH5414> by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of God <WH430>, and to observe <WH8104> and do <WH6213> all the commandments <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> our Lord <WH3068>, and his ordinances <WH4941> and his statutes <WH2706>;
and that we would not give <WH5414> our daughters <WH1323> unto the peoples <WH5971> of the land <WH776>, nor take <WH3947> their daughters <WH1323> for our sons <WH1121>;

and if the peoples <WH5971> of the land <WH776> bring <WH935> wares <WH4728> or any grain <WH7668> on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> to sell <WH4376>, that we would not buy <WH3947> of them on the sabbath <WH7676>, or on a holy <WH6944> day <WH3117>; and that we would forego <WH5203> the seventh <WH7637> year <WH8141>, and the exaction <WH4853> of every debt <WH3027>.

Also we made <WH5975> ordinances <WH4687> for us <WH5414>, to charge ourselves yearly <WH8141> with the third part <WH7992> of a shekel <WH8255> for the service <WH5656> of the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>;

for the showbread <WH4635>, and for the continual <WH8548> meal <WH4503> - offering, and for the continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>, for the sabbaths <WH7676>, for the new moons <WH2320>, for the set feasts <WH4150>, and for the holy <WH6944> things <WH2403>, and for the sin-offerings to make atonement <WH3722> for Israel <WH3478>, and for all the work <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>.

And we cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486>, the priests <WH3548>, the Levites <WH3881>, and the people <WH5971>, for the wood <WH6086> - offering <WH7133>, to bring <WH935> it into the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>, according to our fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, at times <WH6256> appointed <WH2163>, year <WH8141> by year <WH8141>, to burn <WH1197> upon the altar <WH4196> of Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>, as it is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451>;

and to bring <WH935> the first-fruits <WH1061> of our ground <WH127>, and the first-fruits <WH1061> of all fruit <WH6529> of all manner of trees <WH6086>, year <WH8141> by year <WH8141>, unto the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>;

also the first-born <WH1060> of our sons <WH1121>, and of our cattle <WH929>, as it is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451>, and the firstlings <WH1062> of our herds <WH1241> and of our flocks <WH6629>, to bring <WH935> to the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>, unto the priests <WH3548> that minister <WH8334> in the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>;

and that we should bring <WH935> the first-fruits <WH7225> of our dough <WH6182>, and our heave-offerings <WH8641>, and the fruit <WH6529> of all manner of trees <WH6086>, the new wine <WH8492> and the oil <WH3323>, unto the priests <WH3548>, to the chambers <WH3957> of the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>; and the tithes <WH4643> of our ground <WH127> unto the Levites <WH3881>; for they <WH3881>, the Levites, take the tithes <WH6237> in all the cities <WH5892> of our tillage <WH5656>.

And the priest <WH3548> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall be with the Levites <WH3881>, when the Levites <WH3881> take tithes <WH6237>: and the Levites <WH3881> shall bring up <WH5927> the tithe <WH4643> of the tithes <WH4643> unto the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>, to the chambers <WH3957>, into the treasure <WH214> - house <WH1004>.

For the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> shall bring <WH935> the heave-offering <WH8641> of the grain <WH1715>, of the new wine <WH8492>, and of the oil <WH3323>, unto the chambers <WH3957>, where are the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH4720>, and the priests <WH3548> that minister <WH8334>, and the porters <WH7778>, and the singers <WH7891>: and we will not forsake <WH5800> the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>.
